solution_line_template: Three times the number of cows We the People has is {multiplier}*{cows_we_the_people}=<<{multiplier}*{cows_we_the_people}={three_times_cows}>>{three_times_cows} cows.
Happy Good Healthy Family has two more than three times the number of cows We the People has, a total of {three_times_cows}+{extra_cows}={cows_happy_family} cows.
If the cows are taken to a ranch to graze together, their total will be {cows_happy_family}+{cows_we_the_people}=<<{cows_happy_family}+{cows_we_the_people}={total_cows}>>{total_cows} cows.
